definition: gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi
warm clothes such as padded jacket to be worn in air conditioning (esp. in Hong Kong)

sentences.english: Doris:I think because I turned on the air conditioner right after showering and before I blow-dried my hair.
sentences.chinese: 大概是我刚刚洗完澡没吹头发又立刻开冷气的关系吧。

sentences.english: How can I spend my time in such a hot day without air-conditioning?
sentences.chinese: 这样炎热的天，没有冷气，怎么过呀？

sentences.english: Full of cold air around the pain, the eyes of a burning white.
sentences.chinese: 满满的冷气萦绕在周围，痛的眼前一片灼白。

sentences.english: Mom suggested that I should get a refund on the air-conditioner right away.
sentences.chinese: 妈妈建议我赶紧把这台冷气拿去退钱。

sentences.english: Please bring enough clothes to keep you warm (the auditorium's air conditioning is strong).
sentences.chinese: 视听室冷气强，记得备妥御寒衣物。

sentences.english: Around 15000 NTD, all necessary household appliances, an air conditioner, and Northern-Southern exposure would be best.
sentences.chinese: 一万五左右，家电齐全，有冷气，最好是座北朝南的。

sentences.english: The bubble has displaced cold air southward.
sentences.chinese: 这一小气团取代南方冷气团，向南推进。

sentences.english: I gasped with surprise at the unexpected news.
sentences.chinese: 听到这意外的消息我惊得倒吸了一口冷气。

sentences.english: The cold fog pooling around us, the dim bright light on our faces.
sentences.chinese: 冷气围绕着我们，模糊不清的灯光照在我们脸上。

sentences.english: A: What's up with the new air conditioner?
sentences.chinese: 这台新冷气机是怎么回事？

sentences.english: Why are air-conditioners usually placed near the ceiling?
sentences.chinese: 为什么冷气机通常都要装在天花板上？

sentences.english: Used on Air conditioning, Refrigeration, Heating, Lighting and other applications.
sentences.chinese: 专业使用在冷气，冰箱，电热，照明设备方面之行业。

sentences.english: The skin on my nose is peeling. It must be too dry to stay in an air-conditioned room.
sentences.chinese: 我鼻子上的皮肤脱庋了，冷气房一定是太干了。

sentences.english: Test the seal of your refrigerator to ensure cold air isn’t escaping through the doors.
sentences.chinese: 检查冰箱的密封性，确保冷气不会从冰箱门里溜走。

sentences.english: Before how to carry on the air conditioner first movement the maintenance?
sentences.chinese: 如何进行冷气机第一次运行前的保养工作？

sentences.english: We should use fans more often instead of air-conditioners when the weather is hot.
sentences.chinese: 当天气炎热时，我们应该用风扇来代替冷气机。

definition: to tremble/to shiver/uncontrolled shaking of the body
variant of 冷戰|冷战[leng3 zhan5]
to breathe/to suck in/to absorb/to inhale
hiss/neigh/Ss! (sound of air sucked between the teeth, indicating hesitation or thinking over)
sorption (generic term for absorption, adsorption, diffusion, precipitation etc)
overwhelmed with shock, horror or amazement/dumbstruck/aghast
